programs.program:
as principal admin password "password" do
create principal alice "alices_password"
create principal alice2 "alices_password"
set x = "private"
set delegation all admin delegate->alice
set delegation x admin read->alice
return "success"
***

as principal alice password "alices_password" do
set delegation x alice read->alice2
return "Success"
***

as principal alice2 password "alices_password" do
return x
***

as principal alice password "alices_password" do
delete delegation x alice read->alice2
return "Success"
***

as principal alice2 password "alices_password" do
return x
***
